title: Quick and Easy Baked Fish Fillet
method: Step 1: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Step 2: Place flounder in a baking dish; season with salt and pepper.
Step 3: Mix together lemon juice, melted butter, and onion in a small bowl; pour over flounder.
Step 4: Bake in the preheated oven until fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork, 25 to 30 minutes.
